attributes.comment:
USCIS-2006-0044-0001 - Adjustment of the Immigration and Naturalization Benefit
Application and Petition Fee Schedule

An increase of approximately 66% for the processing of adoption-based forms is
not necessary to meet the demands/needs with the processing of such
documents. An increase for services is expected, but to this degree is neither
acceptable nor understandable.

We should be encouraging family growth through adoption and the offering of
making a family for a young orphan who otherwise would not have these
opportunities. The financial implications of this proposal may make it impossible,
with the exception of those in the highest wage earning brackets, to enjoy growing
their family.

Please reconsider proposal USCIS-2006-0044
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Jane Lindenmuth
